docs.lead_paragraph: All adults, including pregnant women and new mothers, should be screened for depression as a routine part of health care, a government advisory group recommended Tuesday.

headline.main: Task Force Urges Doctors to Screen All Adults for Depression
headline.print_headline: Task Force Urges Doctors to Screen All Adults for Depression

docs.snippet: All adults, including pregnant women and new mothers, should be screened for depression as a routine part of health care, a government advisory group recommended Tuesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. health officials on Tuesday issued interim guidelines for health care professionals in the United States caring for infants born to mothers who traveled or lived in an area with Zika virus transmission during pregnancy.

headline.main: U.S. Issues Treatment Guidelines for Infants Exposed to Zika
headline.print_headline: U.S. Issues Treatment Guidelines for Infants Exposed to Zika

docs.snippet: U.S. health officials on Tuesday issued interim guidelines for health care professionals in the United States caring for infants born to mothers who traveled or lived in an area with Zika virus transmission during pregnancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: The World Health Organization says it suspects a link between the mosquito-borne Zika virus and a rare birth defect that gives babies abnormally small heads, but says so far the evidence is "circumstantial" and more research is needed.

headline.main: UN: Zika Virus Link to Babies' Small Heads 'Circumstantial'
headline.print_headline: UN: Zika Virus Link to Babies' Small Heads 'Circumstantial'

docs.snippet: The World Health Organization says it suspects a link between the mosquito-borne Zika virus and a rare birth defect that gives babies abnormally small heads, but says so far the evidence is "circumstantial" and more research is needed.

docs.lead_paragraph: After his factory worker father died a painful death from kidney cancer at age 68 in 2013, Michael Hickey made it his mission to find out why so many people in his hometown along the Hoosic River were getting sick.

headline.main: Factory Village's Trail of Cancer Leads to Tap Water Probe
headline.print_headline: Factory Village's Trail of Cancer Leads to Tap Water Probe

docs.snippet: After his factory worker father died a painful death from kidney cancer at age 68 in 2013, Michael Hickey made it his mission to find out why so many people in his hometown along the Hoosic River were getting sick.

docs.lead_paragraph: Que El Salvador haya aconsejado dejar de tener niños durante dos años es algo que le ha parecido especialmente radical a muchos expertos.

headline.main: El zika irrumpe en El Salvador y desata medidas de emergencia

docs.snippet: Que El Salvador haya aconsejado dejar de tener niños durante dos años es algo que le ha parecido especialmente radical a muchos expertos.

docs.lead_paragraph: Answers to questions about depression screening and maternal mental illness, following new recommendations saying that women should be screened for depression during pregnancy and after childbirth.

headline.main: Short Answers to Hard Questions About Postpartum Depression

headline.main: Your Tuesday Briefing: Hillary Clinton, Planned Parenthood, Novak Djokovic

docs.snippet: Here’s what you need to know to start your day.

docs.lead_paragraph: Grappling with a mosquito-borne virus linked to brain damage in infants, El Salvador is advising all women in the country not to get pregnant until 2018.

headline.main: El Salvador’s Advice on Zika Virus: Don’t Have Babies
headline.print_headline: El Salvador’s Advice on Zika: Don’t Have Babies

docs.abstract: El Salvador, beset by mosquito-borne Zika virus, advises all women in country to avoid becoming pregnant until 2018; warning is indication of government's desperation over epidemic, which has spread across Latin America and infected more than million people in Brazil.
docs.snippet: Grappling with a mosquito-borne virus linked to brain damage in infants, El Salvador is advising all women in the country not to get pregnant until 2018.

byline.contributor: Gene Palumbo contributed reporting from San Salvador, and Donald G. McNeil Jr. from San Francisco.

docs.lead_paragraph: Hospitals are better at preventing deaths, and yet parents may have legitimate reasons for not having deliveries there.

headline.main: How to Make Home Birth a Safer Option

docs.snippet: Hospitals are better at preventing deaths, and yet parents may have legitimate reasons for not having deliveries there.

docs.lead_paragraph: A rare tropical disease is spreading in parts of Latin America and the Caribbean. The mosquito-borne Zika virus usually causes a mild illness but is now suspected in an unusual birth defect and possibly other health issues. Some things to know:

headline.main: What to Know About the Tropical Zika Virus in Latin America
headline.print_headline: What to Know About the Tropical Zika Virus in Latin America
